definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: But the Democrats have lost their sixtieth vote.
sentences.chinese: 但是，民主黨人喪失了其第六十票。

sentences.english: the ascendant Democrats would merely drag their feet on trade matters.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨的上升只會拖拽外貿的腳步。

sentences.english: "The only one with the power to unify the party that has grown hugely is Ozawa," said Democratic Party lawmaker Akihisa Nagashima.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨權力大增，有能力統一它的只有小澤。

sentences.english: The Liberal Democrat from New Jersey died Monday. He was 89.
sentences.chinese: 勞坦柏是新澤西的自由民主黨成員，享年89歲。

sentences.english: Imagine, these lowdown Southern segregationists put the Northern Democrats down.
sentences.chinese: 設想，南方隔離主義的內幕束縛北方民主黨。

sentences.english: Democratic leaders think this is a matter of basic tax fairness.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨領袖認爲這是個稅務公平的基本問題。

sentences.english: He compromised with Democrats to achieve them.
sentences.chinese: 他與民主黨妥協以爭取他們的支持。

sentences.english: Democrats generally endorse the cap-and-trade plan in the bill.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨人普遍贊同議案中的限制和貿易計劃。

sentences.english: What does Horsey think of the Democrats' fascination with Clinton?
sentences.chinese: 霍爾西是如何看待民主黨人對克林頓的迷戀呢？

sentences.english: Our government from both parties Democrat and Repubican fighting each others.
sentences.chinese: 我們的政府，共和和民主黨天天打。

sentences.english: The Democratic Presidential hopeful plans to visit the fallen officier's family.
sentences.chinese: 這位民主黨候選人希望能夠慰問死者的家屬。

sentences.english: "Just for you" is the slogan of this year's NDP conference.
sentences.chinese: “只是爲了你”是今年民族民主黨會議的標語。

sentences.english: This group hews more closely to Democrats than Republicans.
sentences.chinese: 相比起共和黨，這一羣人更傾向民主黨。

sentences.english: Ten Democrats bolted on this vote.
sentences.chinese: 十名民主黨人在這次投票中拒絕支持本黨候選人。

sentences.english: That could mean conflict with her new partner, the FDP.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着可能與她的新盟友自由民主黨發生衝突。

sentences.english: American trade unions, an important Democratic constituency, are decidedly unenthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨的重要選區美國貿易工會顯然缺乏熱情。

definition: to take part in an election/to run for office
Ma Ying-jeou (1950-), Taiwanese Kuomintang politician, Mayor of Taipei 1998-2006, president of Republic of China 2008-2016
to be a candidate in an election or other selection process/to run for office/to turn out to vote
